mapper.insert: insert into movie (movieId, movieName, movieCover, movieUri, movieType, movieFavoriteNum, movieStar, movieOverview, movieReviewId, movieCastCrewId, userId) values (#{movieid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moviename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moviecover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movieuri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movietype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moviefavoritenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moviestar,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{movieoverview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moviereviewid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moviecastcrewid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update movie set movieName = #{moviename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movieCover = #{moviecover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movieUri = #{movieuri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movieType = #{movietype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movieFavoriteNum = #{moviefavoritenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, movieStar = #{moviestar,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, movieOverview = #{movieoverview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movieReviewId = #{moviereviewid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, movieCastCrewId = #{moviecastcrewid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where movieId = #{movieid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select movieId, movieName, movieCover, movieUri, movieType, movieFavoriteNum, movieStar, movieOverview, movieReviewId, movieCastCrewId, userId from movie where movieId = #{movieid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select movieId, movieName, movieCover, movieUri, movieType, movieFavoriteNum, movieStar, movieOverview, movieReviewId, movieCastCrewId, userId from movie
select * from movie where movieName like '%${movieName}%'
select * from movie where movieType like '%${movieType}%'
